item.title: Australian shares track Wall Street higher but snap 4-week winning streak

review.headline_rewrite: Australian shares track Wall Street higher but snap 4-week winning streak
bullets: (Updates to close) * Financials extend gains, up 0.5% Consumer, real estate snap 5-week green streaks Energy firms end 0.3% lower as oil prices
rate cut this month rose, although the benchmark posted its first weekly decline after rising for four consecutive weeks.
Gold stocks climbed 2.1% on the day and notched their fifth consecutive weekly advance.
Oil prices were headed for a weekly loss, weighing on domestic energy stocks, which ended 0.3% lower.
